results.title: Injectable simvastatin in periodontal defects and alveolar ridges: pilot studies.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Two trends were noted in this pilot study: buccal @<m>DISEASE_Jaw_Edentulous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007575 @@@edentulous@@@ ridge thickness was 29% greater with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 0.5 mg, compared to gel alone (P=0.0845), and the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ groups had bone-height loss in interproximal intrabony and furcation defects, but the length of new cementum in the interproximal intrabony defects was greater with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 0.5 mg (0.35+/-0.14 mm), compared to gel alone (0.06+/-0.15 mm; P=0.069).

citations.NLM: Morris MS, Lee Y, Lavin MT, Giannini PJ, Schmid MJ, Marx DB, Reinhardt RA. Injectable simvastatin in periodontal defects and alveolar ridges: pilot studies. J Periodontol. 2008 Aug;79(8):1465-73. PMID: 18672997
citations.BibTeX: @article{18672997, title={Injectable simvastatin in periodontal defects and alveolar ridges: pilot studies.}, author={Morris MS and Lee Y and Lavin MT and Giannini PJ and Schmid MJ and Marx DB and Reinhardt RA}, journal={J Periodontol}, volume={79}, number={8}, pages={1465-73}}

results.title: Simvastatin application to augment facial jaw bone in a dog model: pilot study.
results.text_hl: Regarding the @<m>DISEASE_Jaw_Edentulous</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007575 @@@edentulous ridge@@@, the width of new bone was significantly greater in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ injection specimens (P = 0.0164).

citations.NLM: Rutledge J, Schieber MD, Chamberlain JM, Byarlay M, Killeen AC, Giannini PJ, Marx DB, Reinhardt RA. Simvastatin application to augment facial jaw bone in a dog model: pilot study. J Periodontol. 2011 Apr;82(4):597-605. PMID: 21043796
citations.BibTeX: @article{21043796, title={Simvastatin application to augment facial jaw bone in a dog model: pilot study.}, author={Rutledge J and Schieber MD and Chamberlain JM and Byarlay M and Killeen AC and Giannini PJ and Marx DB and Reinhardt RA}, journal={J Periodontol}, volume={82}, number={4}, pages={597-605}}
